Tacuba , CP. 11410 , Miguel Hidalgo , Ciudad de Tel: CONTRIBUTIONS TO HEALTH1 General elements of homeopathy Homeopathy is a complex medical model that aims to enhance the response capacity of the human body, external stimuli produced by mineral, vegetable or ba sed the individuality of the and on the choice of an ultradilute medication, according to all the symptoms that they present, that is, not all individuals present the same symptoms when suffering from the same disease, therefore that homeopathy takes into account the way in which each person suffers from the disease, considering the set of physical, mental and general signs and symptoms, including how they experience the disease and their social environment, to provide an individualized, and effective treatment which patient's of life. The homeopathy proposal focuses on the person as a biological, psychological and social being (which has been emphasized by the World Health Organization in its definition of healt h), which can adequately respond to the needs and expectations of patients their ailments, disease and health, recognizing the person as whole, indivisible and therefore complex, which requires personalized attention. This model is similar t o the current proposal of person -centered care2, that is trying to disease. It aims to improve the teaching of medicine and medical care 3. The choice of specific homeopathic medicine is based the fact that "there are substances of animal, vegetable or mineral origin capable of producing in a healthy person at doses high, symptoms simi lar to those that manifest in sick individuals", so the symptomatology individuality), of medication and to generate an optimal response to treatment 4. The pharmacology of high dilutio ns or ultra dilutions has allowed different protocols to be carried out for the development of techniques and/or equipment that demonstrate that homeopathic medicines still contain said substance and not water or a lcohol as is normally mentioned14. Homeopathic medicine was developed in Germany more than 200 years ago by Dr. Samuel Hahnemann, and has remained in force as a medical system to this day. It is recognized by the World Health Organization (WHO) and is included in the WHO Strategy 2014 -2023 on Traditional and Complementary Medicine15, 16. Today, it is widely accepted worldwide and is used in many countries; in the cases of Mexico, Switzerland, Brazil, India, among others, it has official recognition, and is even part of its health system, while in other countries such as Colombia, Argentina, Cuba, Germany, France, Russia, Poland, Croatia, Turkey, Canada, among others, is well accepted. In Mexico, it is recognized by the current legal framework and is regulated by the Federal Commission for the P rotection against Sanitary Risks (COFEPRIS). Historical records of homeopathy in the face of epidemics Since the beginning of ho meopathy, homeopathic physicians have been actively involved in the care of patients in some epidemics. A historical review shows that one of the main virtues of homeopathy is that it can be used in the treatment of epidemic diseases21. A case of special mention is in the influenza pandemic of 1918 -1919, known as the Spanish flu, due to the amount of historical records of the use o f homeopathy. We now know that the Spanish flu virus29 was an avian virus and it has been the worst epidemic on record. In just 18 months, 18% of the world's population contracted the disease and 20 to died. The epidemic was so devast ating that the average life expectancy in the United States fell by 10 years. During the epidemic, homeopathic medicines were widely used, both for 28 Golden, I., Large Scale Homoeoprophylaxis: Results of Brief and 2019. developing countries , Op cit . Homeopathic Medicine and COVID -19 COVID -19 is a viral disease caused by SARS -CoV -2 and declared a pandemic by the WHO. The COVID -19 infection emerged in Wuhan, China in late December 2019 and soon became a global health emergency that spread to 216 countries and territories around the Scientific advances and conventional treatments have attempted to resolve this crisis. Homeopathy has been used to solve the symptom s that occur in patients and also as a prophylactic to reduce contagion, in this case giving treatment based on the "epidemic genius". Some of the homeopathic medicines that have been used in this sense with are Bryonia https://doi.org/10.1016/j.homp.2013.10.064 .(https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1475491613001537 ) Strawberries were inoculat 6x,. and water as a control, they observed that there was a significant reduction in the level of infection of the strawberries and an increase in prod uction with respect to the control. 54 Investigación en la que Hibiscus esculentus fue infestada con un 30c y Santonin 30c, observándose una reducción significativa en comparación al control (etanol 30c) así como un mayor contenido protéico. Homeopathy for COVID -19 Prevention: Report of an Intervention at a Brazilian Service study population composed of all. intervention consisted of the administration of Arsenicum album 30cH in a weekly dose to the employees of a company in the service sector in São Paulo, Brazil, and by the company's Occupatio nal Health department. The outcome was the incidence of COVID -19 during the 3 without a previous diagnosis of COVID -19 at the beginning of the study period were analyzed: 53.34% of the employee s were referred to telework at home and did not receive intervention (Group 1, G1); 24.66% remained working at the location in the state of São Paulo and received the intervention (Group 2, G2); 21.98% remained working in company premises i n other states a nd did not receive intervention (Group 3, G3). The incidence of COVID was 13.35%, 0.74% and 67.87%, (p < 0.001). The odds ratio of being infected in (1) 13.70 (95% CI, 88.98 to 900.18) and (3) versus G2 was 20.66 (95% CI, 6.53 to 65.39). Tacuba , CP. 11410 , Miguel Hidalgo , Ciudad de Tel: , www.gob.mx/salud Conclusions This report, without review, is intended to provide and contributions against diseases such as COVID -19, with updated scientific foundations and evidence, to that they can understand it and that it is available, both for health personnel and for people interested in homeopathy. In Mexico, as well as in Switzerland and India, homeopathy is an official therapeutic, so we hope that, with this first effort of identification, collection, systematization and presentation of important and significant information, we can contribute to recognizing and supporting the contributions of this therapeutic clinical model, and that allows in the future, to open new treatment opportunities for many diseases in general and in particular against diseases such as COVID -19, for the benefit of the
